case_body_condition: Not recognizable - Near complete or complete skeleton
case_circumstances: The decedent was found on June 07, 2015 decomposed in the basement of an abandoned property at 3851 North Broad St., 19140.  Body is likely that of an African American male, between 50-65 years of age at the time of death.  The deceased was clothed in a blue pullover fleece and work boots.  Time since death estimated to be no more than 12 months from date found.
case_head_hair: tightly curled black and gray hair
case_facial_hair: tightly curled black and gray hair noted on the preserved portions of facial skin
fingerprints: Fingerprint information is currently not available
case_clothing_on_body: Blue fleece pullover (size XL), portion of a dark discolored t-shirt, blue drawstring sweat pants, and two athletic socks.
case_footwear: Two different boots, a brown and green boot on the right foot, and a black foot on the left foot.
dental: Dental information / charting is available and entered
documents: There are currently no documents available for this case.
